mapper.select: select inventory_history_detail_id, inventory_history_id, inventory_in_commodity_id, inventory_history_num, commodity_num_id, inventory_out_commodity_id, inventory_in_out, commodity_id, sample, supplier_out, inventory_in_commodity_freight, inventory_history_return_num, commodity_num from inventory_history_detail where inventory_history_detail_id = #{inventory_history_detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
